text: If you're interested in a job in the growing Research Triangle NC startup scene, there's a meetup on May 24 where software developers can meet venture funded startups who are hiring. So far there's 15 startups, but there will be others as the date gets closer. http://www.bigtop.it/ Also, consider the job board for downtown durham startups, http://is.gd/5XnLF8
